mapper.sql: ID, APP_KEY, PASSWORD, SALT, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PHONE, EMAIL,PARENT_ID, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, USING_STATUS, LOGIN_NUM, SOURCE

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into t_merchant_info (ID, APP_KEY, PASSWORD, SALT, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PHONE, EMAIL, PARENT_ID, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, USING_STATUS, LOGIN_NUM, SOURCE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{usingStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loginNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{source,jdbcType=CHAR})
